# init(identifier:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a newly created table column with a string identifier.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(identifier: NSUserInterfaceItemIdentifier)
```

## Parameters

- **identifier**: The string identifier for the column.

## Return Value

An initialized table column instance with an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextFieldCell] instance as its default cell.

## Discussion

You can set the table column title using the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableColumn/title] property.

This method is the designated initializer for the `NSTableColumn` class.

## Related Documentation

- **Table View Programming Guide for Mac**
- **identifier**: The identifier string for the table column.
